title: When a Bronze team plays like a Gold team
body:
They win, or at least go even in lanes.

They respond to calls effectively.

They follow up on jungler ganks.

They help take objectives.

And most importantly, _THEY KNOW HOW TO NOT DIE!!!!_

It's so beautiful.......

https://media.giphy.com/media/wAjfQ9MLUfFjq/giphy.gif

replies.body:
I remember a high Bronze/low Silver level game where our team had 5 pink wards out and everyone was using their trinkets. It was like we had map hacks on, we could see everything!

Haven't seen it again since.
but have u seen the heal ghost illaoi 1 trick in bronze?

As a high silver/gold player, this is like when a high silver/gold team plays like a bunch of human beings instead of boosted monkeys.

Have an upvote.
